column1: 254423,Registered Nurse (Perioperative),,"Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column3: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column7: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column9: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health
column13: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column15: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column17: Administer anaesthetics or sedatives to control pain
column21: Assist health care practitioners during surgery
column23: Treat acute illnesses, infections or injuries
column25: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column27: Monitor patients following surgeries or other treatments
column33: Administer health care or medical treatments
column39: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column41: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
column43: Prepare medical supplies or equipment for use
column45: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column51: Administer blood or other fluids intravenously
